news.headline: Momentum Commerce Confirms Record Sales for Amazon Prime Day 2025
news.summary: Momentum Commerce, a modern digital retail consultancy part of PMG, has released its final analysis of Amazon's Prime Day 2025 extended shopping event. The analysis observed more than $750 million in Amazon U.S. transactions across hundreds of brand accounts during the four-day Prime Day 2025 event.

news.headline: Morgan Stanley Raises Amazon PT to $300 — Manageable Tariffs, Strong AI Outlook
news.summary: Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) is a Must-Watch AI Stock on Wall Street. On July 11, Morgan Stanley reiterated the stock as “Buy” and raised its price target on the stock to $300 per share from $250. news.headline: Vertiv $135 PT, Buy Rating — UBS Says Fears Over AWS Are Misguided
news.summary: Vertiv Holdings Co (NYSE:VRT) is a Must-Watch AI Stock on Wall Street. On July 11, UBS analyst Amit Mehrotra reiterated a “Buy” rating on the stock with a $135.00 price target. news.headline: Elon Musk spent months slashing federal contracts — Now his AI company is celebrating a $200M Pentagon contract and new unit to get government business
news.summary: xAI says that it wants to start servicing federal, local, state, and national security customers.

news.headline: Procter & Rivian downgraded, Starbucks gets a new Sell rating
news.summary: Evercore ISI downgraded Procter & Gamble (PG) to In Line from Outperform and cut its price target to $170 from $190, citing growing competition from Amazon and slowing growth. Guggenheim cut Rivian (RIVN) to Neutral from Buy and removed its price target on the stock amid reduced confidence in demand
